subject: Public Speaking
title: Stories About Discovery
description: A micro-lesson that makes Stories About Discovery usable.

hook.text: I always believed X. Then I discovered Y. Everything changed.

buildup.text: Discovery stories model open-mindedness for audiences.

discovery.text: They invite audiences to challenge their own beliefs.

twist.text: A genuine discovery creates trust. You're not lecturing.

climax.text: Discovery stories position speakers as learners, not experts.
